welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Monchengladbach, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, mostly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, with all necessary facilities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free, but it requires a one-time registration.
